title: Governors’ Races to Watch in the Midterm Elections
description: Some of the closest races feature contests involving Republicans who question or deny the results of the 2020 election.
dc:creator: Reid J. Epstein

media:content.media:credit: Nic Antaya for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A crowd at a rally in Ann Arbor cheered for Michigan’s governor, Gretchen Whitmer, who is in a tight race for re-election against Tudor Dixon, her Republican challenger.
